info.title: CSPro Case Data OpenAPI
info.description: CSPro Case Data Schemas represented in OpenAPI format.

tags.name: partialSave
tags.description:
Details on partial save, if applicable.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/partialSave"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: notes
tags.description:
An array containing all notes for the case.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/notes"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: level-1
tags.description:
Represents the top level of the data structure.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/level-1"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: noValueCaseItem
tags.description:
An item that was not filled out in this case.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/noValueCaseItem"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: binaryCaseItem
tags.description:
Non-alphanumeric items with attached files (Audio, Document, Geometry, or Image).
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/binaryCaseItem"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: fileMetadata
tags.description:
The filename and extension metadata associated with an attached file.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/fileMetadata"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: repeatingCaseItem
tags.description:
An array containing instances of an item.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/repeatingCaseItem"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: level-2
tags.description:
The level below level 1. Contains an array of level occurrences.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/level-2"></SchemaDefinition>

tags.name: level-3
tags.description:
The level below level 2. Contains an array of level occurrences. CSPro does not allow any lower levels than this.
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/level-3"></SchemaDefinition>

deleted.description: Indicates whether the case is deleted.

verified.description: Indicates whether the case is verified.

partialSave.title: Partial Save
partialSave.description: Details on partial save, if applicable.

name.description: The name of the field where the partial save stopped.

levelKey.description: The key of the level, if applicable.

notes.title: notes
notes.description: An array containing all notes for the case.

example.text: First Age in Roster here is 19.
example.name: P04_AGE

example.text: This is the first case I have done.
example.name: CEN2000

text.description: The text contents of the note.

modifiedTime.description: The date and time the note was modified (ISO 8601 format).

operatorID.description: The ID of the operator who made the note, if applicable.

name.description: The name of the field where the note was made.

levelKey.description: The key of the level, if applicable.

example.text: First Age in Roster here is 19.
example.name: P04_AGE

record.description: Index of record occurrence. 0-based, so starts at Record 0.

item.description: Index of item occurrence. 0-based, so starts at Item 0.

subitem.description: Index of subitem occurrence. 0-based, so starts at Subitem 0.

level-1.title: First Level Occurrence
level-1.description: Represents the top level of the data structure.

IDItem.title: ID Item
IDItem.description: ID Items are either numeric, string, or noValueCaseItem.

noValueCaseItem.description: An item that was not filled out in this case.

binaryCaseItem.title: Binary Item
binaryCaseItem.description: Non-alphanumeric items with attached files (Audio, Document, Geometry, or Image).

signature.description: A unique signature connected with the attached file.

fileMetadata.description: The filename and extension metadata associated with an attached file.

filename.description: The name of the attached file.

mime.description: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension, defines format of attached file.

code.description: The value of the item. If it is a string, the value must be 'Default'.

label.description: The label paired with the value, if specified.
The label paired with the value, if specified.

repeatingCaseItem.title: Repeating Item
repeatingCaseItem.description: An array containing instances of an item.

level-2.title: Second Level
level-2.description: The level below level 1. Contains an array of level occurrences.

level-3.title: Third Level
level-3.description: The level below level 2. Contains an array of level occurrences. CSPro does not allow any lower levels than this.
